text: "She Used to Be My Girl" is the fourth and final episode of sixteenth season of The Simpsons. It was also the original series finale on FOX during the last episode of 2004. It was shown on December 5, 2004. This episode was directed by Matthew Nastuk and written by Tim Long. Kim Cattrall guest starred as Chloe Talbot. Category:2004 television episodes Category:The Simpsons episodes
title: She Used to Be My Girl
